amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the baseline number of civilian employees at the Department of Defense by 1% every year for the next five years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 54 printed in House Report 112-88 to reduce the baseline number of civilian employees at the Department of Defense by 1% every year for the next five years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 321 (Roll no. 363).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 321 (Roll no. 363).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Campbell.
